trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around August 27th 1997
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing at my back door looking outside.I saw something rotating end over end on the right side of meMy first thought was a plate blowing in the wind . but there was no windVery excitedThe first object was a disk,greenish yellow transparent with 4 equal circles inthe middle moving end over end about 25 feet in the air, as I watched it movingor flying by at a very slow speed I noticed the other object a red lightedsmall dome like object in front of it about 50 feet above and in front of thedisk as though it was guiding it.The objects dissapeared in the night sky as it slowly ascented away
Summary: 1 small redlight followed by 1 small tranparent
